sentences.en: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.cn: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.en: Gill had an extraordinary, incandescent personality.
sentences.cn: 吉尔个性鲜明，热情洋溢。

sentences.en: Groups have a personality of their own.
sentences.cn: 每支乐队都有自己独特的风格。

sentences.en: He had much charm and a winning personality.
He is sharp and manipulative with a strong personality.
sentences.cn: 他个性很强，为人精明且爱指使人。

sentences.en: He is such a personality— he is so funny.
sentences.cn: 他很有个性魅力——非常风趣。

sentences.en: He manifested a pleasing personality on stage.
sentences.cn: 在台上他表现出惹人喜爱的个性。

sentences.en: Her life was her personality writ large.
sentences.cn: 她的生活是她性格放大了的写照。

sentences.en: Jackson doesn't want to damage his reputation as a political personality.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊不想损害自己政界名人的声誉。

sentences.en: Meanwhile the personality cult around this campaigner grew.
sentences.cn: 同时，对这位竞选者的个人崇拜正在逐渐升温。

sentences.en: one of the most well-liked TV personalities
sentences.cn: 最受欢迎的电视名人之一

sentences.en: Serle has a blander personality than Howard.
sentences.cn: 塞尔的性格比霍华德还要沉闷。

sentences.en: She had a bright and bubbly personality.
She tried hard to slough off her old personality.
sentences.cn: 她努力告别从前的个性。

sentences.en: The individual's whole personality appears to be permanently warped.
sentences.cn: 这个人的整个人格似乎被永远地扭曲了。

sentences.en: These personality traits get passed on from generation to generation.
sentences.cn: 这些性格特征代代相传。

sentences.en: Through sheer force of personality Hugh Trenchard had got his way.
sentences.cn: 休·特伦查德完全凭着个人魅力就能随心所欲。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

words.tran_cn: 亲自地；当面；个别地；就自己而言
人事消息栏；人称代名词
个性化（personalize的过去式）；个人化

phrases.tran_cn: 边缘型人格；边缘性人格障碍
人格心理学；个性心理学
人格理论；个性理论；性格理论

trans.tran_cn: 性格，气质，特征，名人，性格鲜明的人
trans.tran_en: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people
